review: Doctor is nice and I have been visiting her since my sone was born in 2023. However, even after booking from practo, i was made to wait between walk in appointments. My child is 18 months with high grade fever (103 degrees) and i had to wait Atleast 25 mins for my turn even after reaching 10 mins before my scheduled time. On top of that, the female assistant with the doctor is quite rude. I understand that there might be many patients back to back but kindness goes a long way specially to parents who are already stressed with their child's health. I hope they rectify this. Thanks.

Doctor Sricha was patient to listen and advise on our concerns. 

Staff was also poliet and friendly.

review: Dr Sricha is a very calm and friendly doctor. She explains all the health issues related to my child everytime I visit the clinic and also promptly responds on call in any emergency situation during night hours as well.  In addition, my child is also comfortable around her and the treatment advised by the dr is really helpful and provides instant relief to my son always for any health related issues. I would like to specially mention that I really loved the kids friendly environment at the clinic  and also the staff who are friendly and cooperative with the parents and the kids. I would highly recommend Dr Sricha to other parents as well for their kids. üòä

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
It has been almost a decade now that I have been bringing my son to Dr Sricha Sharma, you can say since his birth. 
She has always been welcoming and kind to my son and he only wants to see her when he is unwell and no other doctor.
*** ** *** ** *** **** ************* * **** **** ****** *** ** *****
My son was born in one of the biggest hospitals of Delhi but one of my friends suggested to see Dr Sricha incase of any help and that was the best suggestion and decision that my friend gave and I took it.
May God bless Dr Sricha the same love and care she extends to the kids.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: This honest review of mine shows Doctor's down to earth nature and warm approach to make us feel comfortable. I have been visiting doctor from long time. But today i had an issue with waiting time as there was construction work going in complex which is showing bad impact on Doctors clinic. Due to which i couldn't consult doctor and Dr Sricha mam got to know my bad experience from staff and she called me personally and felt sorry about the issue. That was so great of doctor. And doctor gave treatment through phone and i am fully happy with doctors approach. Treatment is always satisfactory . i would highly recommend doctor to everyone who wants special attention and care towards your babies. Thank you so much Doctor once again

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I have been visiting Dr Sricha Sharma for five years now and I can only say that my experience with the doctor and her staff has always been excellent. She is an extremely patient and approachable doctor, and I can not recommend her enough. Her way of organising the clinic and appointments and sending messages regarding vaccinations and follow up appointments is something very few doctors do. I am also most impressed by the way in which her clinic is managing patients during this pandemic. I had visited her for both my sons‚Äô vaccinations and it was an extremely smooth process.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Went there for my son who is 10 months old and was not well since last one month. We visited her atleast thrice during this duration & she keeps advising the same Drugs stating the problem as viral. We trust the doctor with the diagnosis and no hard feeling w.r.t. treatment as many times it happens that a doctor can go wrong with some cases & expertise comes with experience. However what we dont see is the empathy for the patient & especially for the parents. Whenever we were in the situation where we need to call her or connect with her on a call, she never pick up or sometime her attendent pick up and said she will arrange for a call back which never happens. During the last week, my son situation really deteoriates and we consulted some other doctor for second opinion. ******** **** ***** ********** ** ********* **** ***** ***** *** **** ******* ** ** ***** ** *** ** ********* Again out of hope, we tried to connect with her on call & as usual we didn't got any response. We felt devastated and thought of writing this feedback so that some one else should not suffer like us. ** **** **** **** **** ***** ******* **** *** *** ********** ***** **** ******* **** ****** *** ** ***** **** ***** ******** ** ** **** **** ********
reply_text: It is really unfortunate to know that you had such an uncomfortable experience we regret your experience.There must be a communication gap as inspite of being available on the voice calls and whatsapp you could not reach out as per your need.However we hope that the little one recovers well and is safe.

Doctor speaks in very pleasing and empathetic way. Child was nervous before going in the clinic, but came out happy. 
Doctor patiently listened to all the problems, and gave details on all the medicines prescribed.
Moreover, the prescription is a computerized one, much better than the illegible handwritten notes given by many doctors. The prescription also contains the salt name of the medicine, so that you may buy generic medicines with ease.
